title: Ananda College, Colombo: 125 Not Out
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Sudath Silva) Ananda College, Sri Lanka’s premier Buddhist School, turned 125 years on 31 October 2011, and celebrated its historic anniversary under the patronage of President Mahinda Rajapaksa at the school premises yesterday on 29 November.  Having maintained its pristine glory for 124 years, Ananda College stepped…
